title: Warm Couscous Salad with Broad Beans

ingredients.item: 25g chopped, mixed fresh herbs (such as parsley, chives and coriander)

instructions.step: Place 100g essential Waitrose Couscous in a heatproof glass or china bowl. Season well and cover with 225ml boiling water. Give the couscous a stir, then cover and leave to steam for 5 minutes.

Meanwhile, cook 250g fresh or frozen broad beans until tender, then drain and set aside. Fluff the couscous with a fork then add the broad beans, 25g chopped, mixed fresh herbs (such as parsley, chives and coriander), the juice and grated zest of 1 lemon and 2 tbsp olive oil. Serve while still warm, with a watercress salad and a griddled chicken breast or salmon fillet.
